document.full_text: a military tribunal sentenced maikel nabil, 25, for criticizing the armed forces for what he called its continuation of hosni mubarak's corruption and anti-democratic practices.
document.title: egypt sentences blogger to 3 years
lines_and_colors: a military tribunal sentenced maikel nabil, 25, for criticizing the armed forces for what he called its continuation of hosni mubarak's corruption and anti-democratic practices.
